## Result.distanceFromFilter property

The distance from a [AppliedQueryFilter](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.appliedqueryfilter.md) location to the result in meters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
distanceFromFilter?: number;
```

## Remarks

The filter may be an inferred from the search query, or it may be specified explicitly through a facet or static filter on a [VerticalSearchRequest](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.verticalsearchrequest.md)<!-- -->.

## Example

If a user searches for 'Offices in New York' and the VerticalResults contain an `AppliedQueryFilter` for 'New York', the distanceFromFilter value will be from the search result to 'New York'.
